history.proof: intros l x. induction l as [| y l']. - simpl. auto. - simpl. apply fold_left_maximum_le'. hauto l: on depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:

one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
smspi: state_machine_safety'interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
pllsi: prevLog_leader_sublog_interface
ctgt0: current_term_gt_zero_interface
lalcii: lastApplied_le_commitIndex_interface
miaei: match_index_all_entries_interface
lhlli: leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface
lci: leader_completeness_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
glci: ghost_log_correct_interface
lphogli: log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface
glemi: ghost_log_entries_match_interface
tci: transitive_commit_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
rmri: raft_msg_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall (l : list nat) (x : nat), x <= fold_left Init.Nat.max l x

Premises:
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Module Nat := Struct Definition t : Set. Definition zero : nat. Definition one : nat. Definition two : nat. Definition succ : nat -> nat. Definition pred : nat -> nat. Definition add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition double : nat -> nat. Definition mul : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition sub : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition eqb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition leb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition ltb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition compare : nat -> nat -> comparison. Definition max : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition min : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition even : nat -> bool. Definition odd : nat -> bool. Definition pow : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_addmul : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat
Notation max := Init.Nat.max
fold_left : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> A) -> list B -> A -> A
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Module Init := Struct Definition Unconvertible : forall A : Type, A -> A -> Set. Definition unconvertible : forall (A : Type) (a b : A), Unconvertible A a b -> unit. End 
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
fold_left_maximum_le' : forall (l : list nat) (x y : nat), x <= y -> x <= fold_left Init.Nat.max l y
fold_left_length : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), fold_left (fun (x : nat) (_ : A) => S x) l 0 = length l
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
ZMicromega.xhyps_of_pt = fix xhyps_of_pt (base : nat) (acc : list nat) (pt : ZMicromega.ZArithProof) {struct pt} : list nat := match pt with | ZMicromega.DoneProof => acc | ZMicromega.RatProof c pt0 | ZMicromega.CutProof c pt0 => xhyps_of_pt (S base) (RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz base acc c) pt0 | ZMicromega.EnumProof c1 c2 l => let acc0 := RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz base (RingMicromega.xhyps_of_psatz base acc c2) c1 in fold_left (xhyps_of_pt (S base)) l acc0 | ZMicromega.ExProof _ pt0 => xhyps_of_pt (S (S (S base))) acc pt0 end : nat -> list...
OMEGA2 : forall x y : Z, (0 <= x)%Z -> (0 <= y)%Z -> (0 <= x + y)%Z
fast_Zred_factor6 : forall (x : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (x + 0)%Z -> P x
fast_Zred_factor0 : forall (x : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (x * 1)%Z -> P x
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, (z > 0)%Z -> (t > 0)%Z -> (0 <= x)%Z -> (0 <= y)%Z -> (0 <= x * z + y * t)%Z
ghost_log_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (l : ghost_msg) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> fst (pBody p) = l ->...-> Prop Arguments ghost_log_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
fast_OMEGA14 : forall (v l1 l2 : Z) (x : positive) (P : Z -> Prop), P (l1 + l2)%Z -> P (v * Z.neg x + l1 + (v * Z.pos x + l2))%Z
fast_OMEGA13 : forall (v l1 l2 : Z) (x : positive) (P : Z -> Prop), P (l1 + l2)%Z -> P (v * Z.pos x + l1 + (v * Z.neg x + l2))%Z
Record terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface { terms_and_indices_from_one_log_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log net; terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw net } Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m Arguments le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments le_n _%nat_scope Arguments le_S (_ _)%nat_scope
Max.max_case_strong : forall (n m : nat) (P : nat -> Type), (m <= n -> P n) -> (n <= m -> P m) -> P (Nat.max n m)
Init.Nat.max = fix max (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S n' => match m with | 0 => n | S m' => S (max n' m') end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.max (_ _)%nat_scope
handleClientRequest_logs_sorted : forall (h : name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (net : network), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, st, l) -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted_host net -> sorted (log st)
Z.gt = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z = Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.gt (_ _)%Z_scope
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
apply_ops = fun (P0 : BaseParams) (P : DiskOpMultiParams P0) (dsk : do_disk file_name) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) => fold_left update_disk ops dsk : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : DiskOpMultiParams P0), do_disk file_name -> list (disk_op file_name) -> do_disk file_name Arguments apply_ops {P0 P} _ _%list_scope
fast_Zopp_eq_mult_neg_1 : forall (x : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (x * -1)%Z -> P (- x)%Z
fast_Zred_factor5 : forall (x y : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P y -> P (x * 0 + y)%Z
fast_Zplus_comm : forall (x y : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (y + x)%Z -> P (x + y)%Z

inj_le : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> (Z.of_nat n <= Z.of_nat m)%Z
Zle_left : forall n m : Z, (n <= m)%Z -> (0 <= m + - n)%Z
refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_client_request h (nwState net h) client id c -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_client_request h (nwState net h) client id c -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
lastApplied_le_commitIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, lastApplied (nwState net h) <= commitIndex (nwState net h) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments lastApplied_le_commitIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci ->...-> logs_sorted net } Arguments sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope

induction l as [| y l'].
